title: How This Man Found My $100,000 Treasure
description: In this video, Max Fosh creates a treasure hunt where he hides $100,000 and invites viewers to find it.
summary: Max Fosh hides $100,000 in a treasure hunt and watches as a man stumbles upon the prize.
payoff: The payoff comes when a man unexpectedly finds the $100,000 treasure and the reaction of both Max Fosh and the man is priceless.
